member.name: MFVideoArea
member.summary: Specifies a rectangular area within a video frame.

member.name: MFVideoArea.OffsetX
member.summary: An structure that contains the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle. This coordinate might have a fractional value.

member.name: MFVideoArea.OffsetY
member.summary: An structure that contains the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle. This coordinate might have a fractional value.

member.name: MFVideoArea.Area
member.summary: A structure that contains the width and height of the rectangle.
